attributes.action: introduce a young drivers insurance scheme which is not age discriminatory
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the apprentices attending Doncaster motor trades group training association as part of our "Citizenship" disscussions have looked at the costs of motor insurance to young people and our feelings are that altough a higher accident rate group,they are overcharged in comparison to other similair i.e aged drivers in rural communities.We suggest a national third party scheme for all drivers individuals can then top up their own cover to suit their needs,this would allow young drivers to purchase more modern safer vehicles and would reduce the numbers of uninsured drivers.
